Topic.Title: How do I increase text size in the game editor itself?

Posts.EditableText:
I want to preface this by saying, I'm not asking how to change font options in a game. If I just wanted my game to use a different font, or if I wanted the in-game text to be bigger, I wouldn't have made a thread, because I know how to do that.

I switched from a laptop to a desktop recently, and I'm having a hard time working on my game because the screen is much further away. How can I increase the scaling of text, etc. in the Quest game editor itself?

Posts.EditableText: You can lower the screen resolution on your monitor, or change the text size for the screen.
